comments:
build I20031015

- using an old self-hosting workspace, did a refresh in the old sync view
- the workspace was last sync'ed over a month ago, so there were lots of changes
- decided to select all source projects and replace from HEAD
- when done, the sync view still showed some changes under 
org.eclipse.ui.workbench (incoming additions, 5 files each in packages 
org.eclipse.ui.internal.contexts.api and 
org.eclipse.ui.internal.csm.activities.workbench)
- tried Updating these
- it had no effect
- log has:

Another point:
- the Progress view had the following item (twice), with the progress indicator 
showing red:
  Error: Performing CVS update on 5 resources. : An internal error occurred 
during: "Performing CVS update on 5 resources.".

It looks like the remote is null which indicates that there is no remote 
folder but there are incoming changes (or conflicts). Do you still have this 
workspace?
A check has been added to handle the null remote case. Fix released to HEAD.
